official_title: Joint resolution designating the composition known as The Stars and Stripes Forever as the national march of the United States.

summary.text: Designates "The Stars and Stripes Forever", composed by John Philip Sousa, as the national march of the United States.

titles.title: Joint resolution designating the composition known as The Stars and Stripes Forever as the national march of the United States.
